column3: Latest;Kratie:A male dolphin weighing more than 20kg was found dead in the Mekong River on March 31.Â ------The dolphin is thought to have been between 3 and 4 months old and had been dead for a few days.------Chief of the Conservation Guard and Deputy Chief of the Fisheries Administration
column5: said on April 1 that professional authorities took the specimen to research the cause of death. There were no visible scars
column6: but were blood stains around the face.------KOHSANTEPHEAP
